title: Videos in Google Photos won't load
content: A few of my recently uploaded videos will not load in Google Photos in Firefox on my PC. I get a "Your video will be ready soon" message and endlessly rotating loading circle. They are mp4 files, but other mp4 videos taken just seconds apart load and play normally. I've tried clearing my cache and deleting and re-uploading the videos but it doesn't help. The problem persists when I load Firefox in Troubleshooting mode. The same files that won't play in Firefox load and play normally in Google Photos in Chrome on my PC and also on my android phone.
creator: Emma23

title: How to make the middle mouse button be a scroll toggle ONLY?
content:
I use the middle button only for toggling auto-scrolling on and off, or at least that's what I want to do.

That works, unless I mistakenly (often) click the button while over a hyperlinked image or link. In that case, the link opens in a new tab which disrupts my workflow.

How can I set up the mouse in FireFox so that clicking the middle button will ONLY toggle scrolling on and off and never open a link that may happen to be under the cursor?

I've been looking for a solution for this online for ages, and hope there is a setting for this. It's a frustration many times daily.
creator: LTEAK

title: Unlock Real Cash Rewards & Live Match Thrills with an Online Cricket ID Today!
content:
Introduction Cricket isn’t just a game anymore—it’s a full-blown digital experience. Whether you're shouting at the screen during the IPL or analyzing every ball of an ODI, the action doesn’t have to stop at watching. With an online cricket ID, you can jump right into the heart of the action—place bets, build fantasy teams, win real money, and much more. In this guide, we’ll break down what an online cricket ID is, why it’s trending like wildfire, and how you can grab yours and start earning while enjoying your favorite game.

What is an Online Cricket ID? An online cricket ID is your personalized digital key to cricket-based platforms. It connects you with real-time fantasy sports, betting opportunities, and other cricket engagement features—all in one place. Once you register for your ID, you can:

  1. Bet on live matches
  2. Join fantasy cricket leagues
  3. Get real-time match updates
  4. Win actual cash prizes
  5. Access multiple gaming platforms with one account

How to Create Your Online Cricket ID in Minutes

  • Getting started is fast and simple:
  • Visit a trusted cricket gaming site
  • Click “Create Account” or “Get Your Cricket ID”
  • Enter basic details (Name, Phone Number, Password)
  • Verify with OTP or Email
  • Start playing and earning instantly

Many platforms even allow registration through WhatsApp or Telegram for ultra-quick support. What You Can Do With Your Online Cricket ID ✅ Join Fantasy Cricket Contests Pick your dream 11, score based on real-life performances, and win prizes. The better your players perform, the more you earn. ✅ Place Real-Time Bets From toss predictions to final scores, place live bets on a variety of match outcomes. ✅ Track Stats & Leaderboards Your ID gives you access to dashboards packed with live stats, player performance, and rankings. ✅ Make Fast Deposits & Withdrawals Top platforms support UPI, Paytm, PhonePe, and bank transfers with zero hassle and high speed. Who Should Get an Online Cricket ID?

  1. Anyone who loves cricket and is 18+ can join the fun. It's perfect for:
  2. College students who breathe IPL
  3. Office-goers who love side income
  4. Hardcore cricket fans
  5. Fantasy league junkies
  6. Bettors looking for legal, secure platforms

What Makes Online Cricket IDs So Popular? The mix of live excitement, real rewards, and user-friendly gameplay is the magic formula. Plus, the rise of T20 leagues and live-streaming has made digital cricket engagement more accessible than ever. With a single cricket ID, fans can do more than watch—they can interact, predict, win, and celebrate with every match. Common Questions About Online Cricket IDs 1. Is it safe to use an online cricket ID? Yes, as long as you use it on verified platforms that follow legal and security guidelines. 2. Do I need to deposit money to get started? No. You can create a free account. Deposits are only required to enter paid contests or place bets. 3. Can I access my ID from mobile? Absolutely! Most platforms are mobile-optimized or have Android/iOS apps. 4. How do I withdraw my winnings? Withdrawals can be made instantly via UPI, Paytm, PhonePe, or direct bank transfer. Final Words If you’re ready to take your love for cricket beyond just being a fan, then an online cricket ID is your ticket to something bigger. With the chance to play, predict, earn, and win—why settle for being a silent spectator? Gear up, grab your ID, and make every match a money-making adventure. title: Prevent title bar from showing in macOS full-screen mode
content:
When using full-screen mode on macOS, moving the mouse to the top of the screen causes the title bar to appear. This frequently interferes with tab switching and leads to accidental clicks.

Is there any way to disable this automatic title bar reveal? Or, ideally, can it be made to behave like Safari, where only the window buttons slide down from the top-left without showing the entire title bar?
creator: v39v39

title: Firefox seems to freeze my PC when it needs an update.
content: Over the last month or two, my PC has frozen, not crashed, just frozen, while I was watching youtube. I have left it for a few hours, but it does not unfreeze. I am forced to hard restart the PC. When I restart Firefox, the first thing it does is update. It only happens when I have a Youtube video running, Youtube can be open in a tab but not running a video with no issue. Is it possible that the update request is locking up my PC? Is it being caused by Youtube? Any suggestions on how to stop it happening short of changing browsers? No error messages. No crash report. Nothing in the reports file to point me in the right direction.
creator: wilstonehill

title: Why Do You Hate Your Users?
content:
I have selected the option to update when I want. Why am I subjected to constant harassment? Every tab, every window, every EVERYTHING, I am asked if I want to update or dismiss. Please, for the LOVE OF ALL THAT IS HOLY, please stop.

I know that my browser is out of date. I know there is an upgrade available. I am literally considering no longer using your browser because every time I open it, it asks me if I want to update. Even if I updated 48 hours ago, there is usually some newer feature. I DO NOT WANT TO UPDATE MY BROWSER EVERY DAY OR EVEN EVERY WEEK. SO STOP ASKING ME EVERY TIME I OPEN A NEW TAB OR PAGE. You are literally making me dislike your otherwise very good product.
